title: Hostel Fee Payment via Loan Account

content.message: All hostellers who have availed or plan to avail loans from banks (transferred via VAN account) must verify the transferred amount at the Chief Warden's Office.
content.technical_issue: Payments through the VAN account have been temporarily suspended.
content.instructions: Students should make their hostel fee payments directly to the NITA Hostel Fund account in Canara Bank and verify the payment at the Chief Warden's Office.

copy_to: Wardens and Supervisors of NITA Hostel
System Administrator to upload on NITA website
